more_content:
Make this weekend the weekend you get away to New York City. See the bright lights of Times Square, take in the breathtaking views from the Empire State Building, eat your heart out by digging into some amazing New York style pizza, or catch a game at Madison Square Garden. When you stay at The New Yorker, a Wyndham Hotel, you’re in the center of it all. Located in the heart of Manhattan, The New Yorker is a block away from Penn Station and just a few minutes walk from Port Authority, for those arriving by train or bus. If you prefer to drive, we’ve got a valet package that’s perfect. In fact, we have several packages that are perfect for a New York City weekend getaway. Have a look:

 

Valet Package

Prefer to drive to New York City? Let The New Yorker take care of your car. As part of our valet parking package, we give you $30 off the price of parking per night, which comes in quite handy, especially with how quickly the price of parking can run up in the city.

 

Macy’s Shop and Stay package

Maybe you’re headed to New York City for the shopping. The New Yorker is located a block away from the world-famous Macy’s Herald Square. And with our Macy’s Shop and Stay package, we’ll treat you to a hearty breakfast and a gift card, so you can shop til you drop inside this flagship department. Once you’ve shopped until you can’t shop anymore, your bed will be waiting just around the corner at The New Yorker.

 

Discounted Broadway Tickets

Now, if you’re planning on coming to New York for Broadway, say to see one of the classics like Wicked or Cats, we at The New Yorker offer discounted tickets when you book your night stay with us. Think The Book of Mormon, Jersey Boys, Chicago, The Phantom of the Opera, Kinky Boots and more at deep discounts. Consult our Broadway packages here.

 

Empire Package & Legacy Package

If you’re more interested in sight-seeing on your NYC weekend getaway, consider our Empire Package and our Legacy Package. The Empire Package includes breakfast for two at The New Yorker Sky Lounge, with its gorgeous views of New York City, along with passes to the Empire State Building observation deck for yet another great view of the city. Then there’s the Legacy Package. The Legacy Package takes you to the 9/11 memorial and museum, along with breakfast for two at The New Yorker Sky Lounge.

Which will you choose this weekend?
